title: LinkedIn content factory: Auto-generate posts with GPT-5, DALL¬∑E & Google Sheets
description:
Overview

Tired of cookie-cutter ‚ÄúAI LinkedIn post generators‚Äù? This workflow goes beyond just text generation ‚Äî it orchestrates the entire lifecycle of a LinkedIn post. From idea capture to deduplication, from GPT-powered drafting to automatic image generation and link storage, it creates ready-to-publish posts while keeping your content unique and audit-friendly.

What does this workflow do?

This workflow:

Captures Ideas & Briefs ‚Äì Inputs are logged in Google Sheets with audience, goals, and angles.

Deduplicates Smartly ‚Äì Avoids repeating hooks or ideas with fuzzy GPT-based dedupe + GSheet logs.

Generates Posts ‚Äì GPT (OpenAI) drafts sharp LinkedIn-ready posts based on your brief.

Creates Images ‚Äì Post hook + body is sent to an Image Gen model (DALL¬∑E / SDXL) ‚Üí PNG asset.

Stores & Links ‚Äì Final text + image uploaded to Google Drive with shareable links.

Audit Trail ‚Äì GSheets keeps full history: raw idea, draft, final post, assets, notes.

Why is this useful?

Most ‚ÄúAI post generators‚Äù just spit out text. This workflow builds a real publishing pipeline:

üîÑ No duplicates ‚Üí keeps posts fresh & original.

üñº Images included ‚Üí auto-generated visuals increase engagement on LinkedIn.

üìä Audit-ready ‚Üí every post has a traceable log in Sheets.

‚ö° Fast iteration ‚Üí from half-baked thought ‚Üí polished post in minutes.

Tools used

n8n (Orchestrator): Automates triggers, merges, retries, and Google connectors.

OpenAI (LLM): Idea generation, drafting, fuzzy dedupe, and voice conformity.

Google Sheets: Source of truth ‚Äî stores ideas, dedupe logs, audit trail.

Google Drive: Stores rendered images and shares links for publishing.

Image Generation (DALL¬∑E / SDXL): Creates header graphics from hook + body.

Who is this for?

üßë‚Äçüíª Product Managers / Founders who want to post consistently but don‚Äôt have time.

üé® Creators who want to add unique visuals without hiring a designer.

‚öôÔ∏è n8n Builders who want to see how AI + automation + storage can be stitched into one pipeline.

Workflow Highlights

‚úÖ Full content pipeline (ideas ‚Üí images ‚Üí final copy).

‚úÖ GPT-based fuzzy dedupe to avoid repetition.

‚úÖ Auto-generated images for higher engagement.

‚úÖ Clean logs in Google Sheets for future reuse & audits.

‚úÖ Ready-to-publish LinkedIn post in minutes.
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
